title: Linotype releases public beta version of its new font manager, FontExplorer X
content:
Linotype is pleased to present the world’s newest full-service font manager, FontExplorer X—soon to be released for download, free of charge.

Complete information and a downloadable public beta version are available here: [http://www.linotype.com/fontexplorerX](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210802/http:/www.linotype.com/fontexplorerX)
author: dan_reynolds : 14 September, 2005 - 1:34am
